# 新时期我国信息技术产业的发展

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xin-shiqi-woguo-xinxijishu-chanye-de-fazhan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xin-shiqi-woguo-xinxijishu-chanye-de-fazhan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xin-shiqi-woguo-xinxijishu-chanye-de-fazhan
xin-shiqi-woguo-xinxijishu-chanye-de-fazhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xin-shiqi-woguo-xinxijishu-chanye-de-fazhan
xin-shiqi-woguo-xinxijishu-chanye-de-fazhan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
